response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value for you. After careful consideration and evaluation of its worth, I propose to sell this unique item to you at a special price of $1,100,000. This offer represents a significant saving compared to its true value of $1,200,000, making it a compelling proposition for you. I believe this product will not only meet but exceed your expectations, providing substantial benefits and returns. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 1100000}
